Title: Wujing (No. 84)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Lukas Reiter, Jason George (executive story editor), Amanda Kate Shuman (story editor), Brandon Sonnier (staff writer), Brandon Margolis (staff writer)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: Red (James Spader) takes Liz (Megan Boone) on an undercover assignment to bring down a freelance Chinese spy who's targeting CIA agents.
